original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 9.6. Sahetukadukādi, Kusalattika
analyzed: sa hetuka duka ādi kusala ttika

original: Nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ
analyzed: na sa hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagata

original: uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatam moham paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpe ekam mahābhūtam paṭicca tayo

original: mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte …pe… nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko
analyzed: mahābhūtā pe dve mahābhūte pe na sa hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā vicikicchā sahagatam uddhacca sahagatam moha

original: paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā.
analyzed: paṭicca sampayuttakāḥ khandhāḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vatthum paṭicca sa hetukāḥ khandhāḥ

original: Nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko nakusalo ca
analyzed: na sa hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ na kusalo ca na ahetukaḥ na kusalo ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasahetukaṁ nakusalañca naahetukaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sahetukam na kusalam ca na ahetukam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sahetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nasahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukam na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasahetukaṁ naakusalañca naahetukaṁ naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sahetukam na akusalañca na ahetukam na akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sahetukaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava

original: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na ahetukam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākatañca naahetukaṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sahetukam na abyākatam ca na ahetukam na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate pañca

original: (Hetusampayuttadukaṁ sahetukadukasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu sampayutta dukam sa hetuka duka sadisa
